DzInstanceGroupNode Class Reference
[Scene Items]

Class that create a multiple instance of another object target node. These instances draws the same as the target node except for transform. More...

#include <dzinstancenode.h>

void removeItem (int index)

Detailed Description

Class that create a multiple instance of another object target node. These instances draws the same as the target node except for transform.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Default Constructor.

Member Function Documentation

void DzInstanceGroupNode::beginItemEdit (  )  [slot]

If adding or removing many items from this node it is more efficient to call beginItemEdit() do edits and call finishItemEdit when done.

Removes all items from this node.
